name: venturediveassignment
description: 1. Even Challenge    This task is to evaluate your understanding of loops in JavaScript. Write a program that contains a variable named "limit", which will be a positive number, the program should then print even numbers from 0 up to the number defined in "limit".    Example: If the limit is set to 10, the program should output the following: 0 2 4 6 8 10
author: Zawwar Ahmed
